thread.title: EU recalls its Russia ambassador over spy saga

title: EU recalls its Russia ambassador over spy saga
text:
EU recalls its Russia ambassador over spy saga Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:03 
European Union leaders backed Britain on Thursday in blaming Moscow over a nerve agent attack on a former Russian spy in England and recalled their envoy to Moscow in a symbolic protest. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
European Union leaders backed Britain on Thursday in blaming Moscow over a nerve agent attack on a former Russian spy in England and recalled their envoy to Moscow in a symbolic protest.
